data.message: Seriously. Can we get back to that down ass hustler whiteboy Yelawolf and leave this shitkicker garbage in the dust already!?!!

replies.message: He's garbage .. To the can with it

Whoa whoa whoa. I'm not goin to say Yelawolf is garbage. Dude's one of the dopest rappers we have today. Trunk Muzik was the dopest shit in a decade when it dropped.
Dude has skills and originality for days. 
But the honkey tonk banjo fuckin twang is not cutting it. I think it was cool to experiment with but as a fan who's familiar with his entire catalogue I can assure myself that he's beyond this shit. He think he's making quality music, and he is. But he needs to get back to that Yelawolf music. It's even better.
